00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : PreStreamF
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00033 
00034  SUBROUTINE PreStreamF
00035 
00036 ! Common Variables
00037  USE NTypes,    ONLY : DBL
00038  USE Domain
00039  USE FluidParams
00040  USE LBMParams
00041  IMPLICIT NONE
00042 
00043 ! Local Variables
00044  INTEGER :: i, j, ie, iw, jn, js, ie2, iw2, jn2, js2
00045  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: Fs, ux, uy, U_sq, v
00046  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: aux, rhon, tau, invtau, AX, rho3, psi3, invCsRho
00047  REAL(KIND = DBL) :: gradPsiX_f, gradPsiY_f, gradRhoU, gradPsiU, gradRhoPsi
00048  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(0:8) :: feq, Gam
00049  REAL(KIND = DBL), DIMENSION(1:8) :: gradPsiD, gradRhoD
00050 
00051 
00052  DO j = yl_f, yu_f
00053    DO i = xl_f, xu_f
00054 
00055 ! Define some local values
00056      rhon = rho_f(i,j)
00057      rho3 = 3.D0*rho_f(i,j)
00058      psi3 = 3.D0*psi_f(i,j)
00059      ux   = u_f(i,j,1)
00060      uy   = u_f(i,j,2)
00061      U_sq = 0.5D0*( ux*ux + uy*uy )
00062      tau  = tauL + (rhon - rhoL)*tauRhoStar
00063      invtau   = 0.5D0/tau
00064      invCsRho = invCs_sq*rho_f(i,j)
00065 
00066 ! Identify first neighbors
00067      ie = ni_f(i,j,1)
00068      jn = ni_f(i,j,2)
00069      iw = ni_f(i,j,3)
00070      js = ni_f(i,j,4)
00071 
00072 ! Identify second neighbors
00073      ie2 = ni_f(ie,j,1)
00074      jn2 = ni_f(i,jn,2)
00075      iw2 = ni_f(iw,j,3)
00076      js2 = ni_f(i,js,4)
00077 
00078 !--------- Standard Derivatives ------------------------------------------------
00079 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00080      gradPsiX_f = ( 4.D0*( psi_f(ie,j ) - psi_f(iw,j ) ) + psi_f(ie,jn) &
00081                 - psi_f(iw,js) + psi_f(ie,js) - psi_f(iw,jn) )*inv12
00082 
00083      gradPsiY_f = ( 4.D0*( psi_f(i ,jn) - psi_f(i ,js) ) + psi_f(ie,jn) &
00084                 - psi_f(iw,js) + psi_f(iw,jn) - psi_f(ie,js) )*inv12
00085 
00086 !--------- Directional derivatives ( Second order mixed differencing scheme ) --
00087 ! Gradient of the density rho
00088      AX = rho_f(ie2,j) - rho_f(i,j)
00089      gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(ie2,j  ) + 4.D0*rho_f(ie,j ) - rho3 )
00090      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(1) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(1) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(ie,j) - rho_f(iw,j) )
00091 
00092      AX = rho_f(i,jn2) - rho_f(i,j)
00093      gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(i  ,jn2) + 4.D0*rho_f(i ,jn) - rho3 )
00094      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(2) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(2) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(i,jn) - rho_f(i,js) )
00095 
00096      AX = rho_f(iw2,j) - rho_f(i,j)
00097      gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(iw2,j  ) + 4.D0*rho_f(iw,j ) - rho3 )
00098      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(3) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(3) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(iw,j) - rho_f(ie,j) )
00099 
00100      AX = rho_f(i,js2) - rho_f(i,j)
00101      gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(i  ,js2) + 4.D0*rho_f(i ,js) - rho3 )
00102      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(4) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(4) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(i,js) - rho_f(i,jn) )
00103 
00104      AX = rho_f(ie2,jn2) - rho_f(i,j)
00105      gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(ie2,jn2) + 4.D0*rho_f(ie,jn) - rho3 )
00106      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(5) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(5) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(ie,jn) - rho_f(iw,js) )
00107 
00108      AX = rho_f(iw2,jn2) - rho_f(i,j)
00109      gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(iw2,jn2) + 4.D0*rho_f(iw,jn) - rho3 )
00110      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(6) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(6) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(iw,jn) - rho_f(ie,js) )
00111 
00112      AX = rho_f(iw2,js2) - rho_f(i,j)
00113      gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(iw2,js2) + 4.D0*rho_f(iw,js) - rho3 )
00114      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(7) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(7) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(iw,js) - rho_f(ie,jn) )
00115 
00116      AX = rho_f(ie2,js2) - rho_f(i,j)
00117      gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( - rho_f(ie2,js2) + 4.D0*rho_f(ie,js) - rho3 )
00118      IF ( AX*gradRhoD(8) < 0.D0 ) gradRhoD(8) = 0.5D0*( rho_f(ie,js) - rho_f(iw,jn) )
00119 
00120 ! Gradient of the chemical potential psi
00121      AX = psi_f(ie2,j) - psi_f(i,j)
00122      gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(ie2,j  ) + 4.D0*psi_f(ie,j ) - psi3 )
00123      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(1) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(1) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(ie,j) - psi_f(iw,j) )
00124 
00125      AX = psi_f(i,jn2) - psi_f(i,j)
00126      gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(i  ,jn2) + 4.D0*psi_f(i ,jn) - psi3 )
00127      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(2) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(2) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(i,jn) - psi_f(i,js) )
00128 
00129      AX = psi_f(iw2,j) - psi_f(i,j)
00130      gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(iw2,j  ) + 4.D0*psi_f(iw,j ) - psi3 )
00131      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(3) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(3) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(iw,j) - psi_f(ie,j) )
00132 
00133      AX = psi_f(i,js2) - psi_f(i,j)
00134      gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(i  ,js2) + 4.D0*psi_f(i ,js) - psi3 )
00135      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(4) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(4) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(i,js) - psi_f(i,jn) )
00136 
00137      AX = psi_f(ie2,jn2) - psi_f(i,j)
00138      gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(ie2,jn2) + 4.D0*psi_f(ie,jn) - psi3 )
00139      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(5) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(5) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(ie,jn) - psi_f(iw,js) )
00140 
00141      AX = psi_f(iw2,jn2) - psi_f(i,j)
00142      gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(iw2,jn2) + 4.D0*psi_f(iw,jn) - psi3 )
00143      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(6) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(6) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(iw,jn) - psi_f(ie,js) )
00144 
00145      AX = psi_f(iw2,js2) - psi_f(i,j)
00146      gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(iw2,js2) + 4.D0*psi_f(iw,js) - psi3 )
00147      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(7) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(7) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(iw,js) - psi_f(ie,jn) )
00148 
00149      AX = psi_f(ie2,js2) - psi_f(i,j)
00150      gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( - psi_f(ie2,js2) + 4.D0*psi_f(ie,js) - psi3 )
00151      IF ( AX*gradPsiD(8) < 0.D0 ) gradPsiD(8) = 0.5D0*( psi_f(ie,js) - psi_f(iw,jn) )
00152 
00153 !--------- Equilibrium values of Gamma, and the distribution function f --------
00154      aux    =  W0C*U_sq
00155      Gam(0) = W0 - aux
00156      feq(0) = ( W0 - aux )*rhon
00157 
00158      aux    = W1C*(ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00159      Gam(1) = W1 + aux 
00160      feq(1) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00161 
00162      aux    = W1C*( uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00163      Gam(2) = W1 + aux
00164      feq(2) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00165 
00166      aux    = W1C*( -ux + 1.5D0*ux*ux - U_sq )
00167      Gam(3) = W1 + aux
00168      feq(3) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00169 
00170      aux    = W1C*( -uy + 1.5D0*uy*uy - U_sq )
00171      Gam(4) = W1 + aux
00172      feq(4) = ( W1 + aux )*rhon
00173 
00174      v      = ux + uy
00175      aux    = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00176      Gam(5) = W2 + aux
00177      feq(5) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00178 
00179      v      = -ux + uy
00180      aux    = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00181      Gam(6) = W2 + aux
00182      feq(6) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00183 
00184      v      = -ux - uy
00185      aux    = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00186      Gam(7) = W2 + aux
00187      feq(7) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00188 
00189      v      = ux - uy
00190      aux    = W2C*( v + 1.5D0*v*v - U_sq )
00191      Gam(8) = W2 + aux
00192      feq(8) = ( W2 + aux )*rhon
00193 
00194 ! Define directional terms that go with "u" and are common to all f components
00195      gradRhoU = ux*gradRhoX_f(i,j) + uy*gradRhoY_f(i,j)
00196      gradPsiU = ux*gradPsiX_f      + uy*gradPsiY_f
00197      gradRhoPsi = gradRhoU - invCsRho*gradPsiU
00198 
00199 !--------- Collision and stream for the distribution function f ----------------
00200 ! Direction 0
00201      Fs = Gam(0)*gradRhoPsi
00202      fbar(i ,j ,0) = f(i,j,0) + invtau*( feq(0) - f(i,j,0) ) - 0.5D0*Fs
00203 
00204 ! Direction 1
00205      Fs = Gam(1)*( gradRhoD(1) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(1) - gradRhoPsi )
00206      fbar(ie,j ,1) = f(i,j,1) + invtau*( feq(1) - f(i,j,1) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00207 
00208 ! Direction 2
00209      Fs = Gam(2)*( gradRhoD(2) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(2) - gradRhoPsi )
00210      fbar(i ,jn,2) = f(i,j,2) + invtau*( feq(2) - f(i,j,2) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00211 
00212 ! Direction 3
00213      Fs = Gam(3)*( gradRhoD(3) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(3) - gradRhoPsi )
00214      fbar(iw,j ,3) = f(i,j,3) + invtau*( feq(3) - f(i,j,3) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00215 
00216 ! Direction 4
00217      Fs = Gam(4)*( gradRhoD(4) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(4) - gradRhoPsi )
00218      fbar(i ,js,4) = f(i,j,4) + invtau*( feq(4) - f(i,j,4) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00219 
00220 ! Direction 5
00221      Fs = Gam(5)*( gradRhoD(5) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(5) - gradRhoPsi )
00222      fbar(ie,jn,5) = f(i,j,5) + invtau*( feq(5) - f(i,j,5) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00223 
00224 ! Direction 6
00225      Fs = Gam(6)*( gradRhoD(6) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(6) - gradRhoPsi )
00226      fbar(iw,jn,6) = f(i,j,6) + invtau*( feq(6) - f(i,j,6) ) + 0.5D0*Fs 
00227 
00228 ! Direction 7
00229      Fs = Gam(7)*( gradRhoD(7) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(7) - gradRhoPsi )
00230      fbar(iw,js,7) = f(i,j,7) + invtau*( feq(7) - f(i,j,7) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00231 
00232 ! Direction 8
00233      Fs = Gam(8)*( gradRhoD(8) - invCsRho*gradPsiD(8) - gradRhoPsi )
00234      fbar(ie,js,8) = f(i,j,8) + invtau*( feq(8) - f(i,j,8) ) + 0.5D0*Fs
00235 
00236    END DO
00237  END DO
00238 
00239  RETURN
00240  END SUBROUTINE PreStreamF
Generated on Mon Nov 10 16:42:10 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
